name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Wild!
description:
RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Wild! is a strategy game developed by Frontier Developments and Chris Sawyer. It came out on 27-10-2005. It was published by Atari. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Wild! is available on PC.
Jonny Watts produced the game. It was scored by Alistair Lindsay.
